mdRecord.dcterms:description: Built 1616; rebuilt ca. 1694; extensively remodeled by Robert Adam beginning 1764. Extensions by George Saunders, beginning 1793; alterations by William Atkinson, 1803-1839. Major renovations 2012-2013. Now a historic house museum and home of the Iveagh Bequest. â€” https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kenwood_House [work]
